nav.div: Doniphan R-I School District » News » What's New » COVID-19 Update - April 28, 2020

div.br:
Dates for Summer School has TENTATIVELY been scheduled for June 1 – June 30. Please note, these dates could change as Federal and State guidelines are updated. Registration will be May 4 – May 15. If you have already submitted a registration form, you do not have to resubmit. Those who would like to register may do so by:
• Calling the building principal’s office
• Emailing the building principal
• Coming to the building principal’s office
• Using this Google form
The curriculum for this year’s summer school will focus on core subjects with an emphasis on Math and Communication Arts (English). Doniphan R-1 will mirror 4th quarter objectives and lessons.
GRADUATION/HONORS ASSEMBLY:
The Honors Assembly and Graduation has TENTATIVELY been scheduled on June 12. The Honors Assembly will begin at 6:30 p.m. and Graduation will follow. This date may change and/or restrictions could be implemented based on Federal and State guidelines at the time of the ceremony.
PROM:
Prom has TENTATIVELY been scheduled for June 6 with Grand March starting at 6:00 p.m. This date may change and/or restrictions could be implemented based on Federal and State guidelines at the time of the event.
MEALS:
We will continue to distribute meals through May 29. Deliveries and pickups will continue on Tuesday’s and Friday’s. Pickups will continue to be between 8:00 a.m. -11:00 a.m. and deliveries will be 11:00 a.m. – 1:00 p.m.
ENRICHMENT/SCHOOL WORK:
Packets are still available on Tuesday’s and Friday’s through May 29. Those can be picked-up at the elementary cafeteria between 8:00 a.m. and 11:00 a.m.
